response.summary:
Chemical Engineer and Quality and Process Management specialist. With more than six years of work experience in the design and development of new products, quality control and sales of concrete, cement, mortars and chemical admixtures for the construction industry. I've led different projects related to the technical development of concrete and chemical admixtures, laboratory analysis implementation, management systems application and construction materials sales. I have deep knowledge in metrology, technology forecasting, water treatment processes and quality management.  I have also some experience with the chemical processes of the brewery industry (malting especially). Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; proactive, adaptive, independent but also a good team player with a high degree of responsibility and ethic.

My main interests are research and development of new materials, developing sales strategies with a technological and innovative approach, the cement and concrete industry, food engineering, system management implementation, auditing processes (ISO 9001; ISO 14001; ISO IEC 17025) and multidisciplinary research in chemical engineering.

company.name: CEMEX
company.description:
Cemex is a global industry leader in producing and supplying cement, aggregates, ready-mix concrete, and urbanization solutions.
 
We’re driving innovation further to solve the world’s building challenges and help the world reach the next frontier of sustainable living. 

#BuildingABetterFuture 

Nuestra compañía fue fundada en Monterrey, México, en 1906. Empezamos como una empresa local y, gracias a nuestra visión, evolucionamos hasta convertirnos en una de las compañías globales líderes en nuestra industria. 

En México contamos con una capacidad de producción anual  de 30 millones de toneladas de cemento, operamos con 15 plantas de cemento, 265 plantas de concreto premezclado, 15 canteras de agregados, 78 centro de distribución terrestre y 7 terminales marítimas.

Construimos un mejor futuro gracias a nuestro afán de innovar a través de una oferta de productos y soluciones integrales de calidad y de un proceso operativo eficiente y seguro que respeta el medio ambiente.
